plugin.name: SQL Server
plugin.description: Management agent to query and monitor SQL Server

c:simple-property.name: host
c:simple-property.description: the hostname or IP address that the database is listening on

c:simple-property.name: port
c:simple-property.description: the TCP port that the database is listening on

c:simple-property.name: db
c:simple-property.description: the name of the database to connect to

c:simple-property.name: driverClass
c:simple-property.description: the fully-qualified classname of the JDBC driver class

c:simple-property.name: principal
c:simple-property.description: the database role to connect as

c:simple-property.name: credentials
c:simple-property.description: the password for the database role being used to connect

metric.description: The reserved amount of data in KB
The amount of data currently stored in KB
The amount of data spent in indexes in KB
The amount of unused, but reserved space in KB
The estimated count of rows in the table.

c:simple-property.name: table
c:simple-property.description: The table to discover and to be queried on for metric data

c:simple-property.name: name
c:simple-property.description: Initial name of the resource when manually added. This is also part of the resource key - make this unique if you want two Query resources based on the same table.

c:simple-property.name: description
c:simple-property.description: Initial description of resource when manually added

c:simple-property.name: metricQuery
c:simple-property.description: The query that will gather metric data. This must return two columns, a string column whose value is 'metricColumn' and then a numeric column whose value is the metric to be collected.

metric.description: The metric value for this Query. If Metric Query is not specified, this is not collected.
